headline: Newmont Announces Agreement to Divest CC&V for up to $275 Million
summary: DENVER, December 06, 2024--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) ("Newmont" or the "Company") announced today that it has agreed to sell its Cripple Creek & Victor ("CC&V") operation in Colorado, USA, to SSR Mining Inc. ("SSR") for up to $275 million in cash consideration. Upon closing the announced transactions, Newmont will have delivered up to $3.9 billion in gross proceeds from non-core asset divestitures and investment sales.1 The transaction is expected to close in
